Question: This person flew 78 missions over Korea for a total of 121 hours in the air, most of which were in January 1952.
Hints: Sizemore, unable to get the hair back, decided to donate the proceeds to the charity of this person's choice.
This person was approached by political groups from both ends of the spectrum after his aeronautical career.
In return, this person gave Wendt a ticket for a "space taxi" "good between two planets".
